name: vercel-deployment-task
description: An Azure Pipelines Task Extension for automatically deploying to Vercel
author: Vercel

inputs.name: vercelProject
inputs.label: Vercel Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of your Vercel Project

inputs.name: vercelToken
inputs.label: Vercel Token

inputs.name: production
inputs.label: Deploy to Production
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the task deploy to production? Defaults to false
